sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; function MyPoll({ team }) { return (
Category: {team.sport}

Country: {team.country}

Group: {team.group}

Status: {team.state==='STARTED' ? "Running" : "Not running"}

My Vote: {team.voteType}

{team.homeName}

VS

{team.awayName}

); } export default MyPoll
